requirement.topic: XmlBlaster allows to qualify messages as read only
requirement.description: Using the QOS flag </Readonly> allows to mark a published message as read only (you may think of a final/const message). The first published message is respected, later published messages are rejected. The XmlBlasterException id="MessageUnitWrapper.Readonly" is thrown.
requirement.example:
<qos>
         <Readonly /> <!-- A final/const message which may not be changed with further updates -->
                         <!-- Default is Read/Write -->
      </qos>
requirement.author: ruff@swand.lake.de
